scripts.build: composer install --no-dev && npm run uglify && npm run makepot && npm run sass && npm run archive
scripts.build:dev: composer install && npm run uglify && npm run makepot && npm run sass
scripts.postarchive: rm -rf woocommerce-deposits && unzip woocommerce-deposits.zip -d woocommerce-deposits && rm woocommerce-deposits.zip && zip -r woocommerce-deposits.zip woocommerce-deposits && rm -rf woocommerce-deposits
scripts.uglify: for f in $npm_package_assets_js_js; do file=${f%.js}; node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs $f -c -m > $file.min.js; done
scripts.postsass: for f in $npm_package_assets_styles_css; do file=${f%.css}; node_modules/.bin/cleancss -o $file.css $f; done
scripts.makepot: wpi18n makepot --domain-path languages --pot-file woocommerce-deposits.pot --type plugin --main-file woocommerce-deposits.php --exclude node_modules,tests,docs
